title: Calories in a Bagel with Cream Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in bagel cream cheese serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations under 160 characters.
h1: Calories in a Bagel with Cream Cheese
assumptions: Standard plain bagel (~100 g), topped with 1 oz (28 g) full-fat cream cheese; no additional toppings or butter.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bagel size, brand, cream cheese type, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One bagel with 1 oz cream cheese has ~380 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

basis.label: per 1 serving (1 bagel + 1 oz cream cheese)

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Whole wheat bagel instead of plain

faqs.q: How many calories in a plain bagel with cream cheese?
faqs.a: About 380 kcal for one standard serving with 1 oz cream cheese.

faqs.q: What's the protein in bagel cream cheese?
faqs.a: Roughly 12 g protein per serving, mainly from the bagel.

faqs.q: Are bagels with cream cheese high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, ~52 g carbs per serving, mostly refined from the bagel.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a bagel with cream cheese?
faqs.a: About 15 g total fat, including 8 g saturated from the cream cheese.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in bagel cream cheese?
faqs.a: Opt for low-fat cream cheese or half the amount to cut ~40 kcal.
